import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import regUserData from './registration_user_data.json' const Registration=()=> { const [regUserData,setRegUserData]=useState([ {id:'', fname:'', lname:'', email:'', password:'', cpassword:'', location:''} ]) const inputhandler=(e)=> { this.setState( { ...this.regUserData , [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } {/* sending form data to json file */} useEffect( submithandler=()=> { axios.get(regUserData).then(()=>this.props.history.push(regUserData)) } , []) return( <> {/* heading */}

REGISTRATION FORM

{/* heading */} {/* registration form */}
{/* registration form */} ) } export default Registration;
